sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The SGML Common package contains install-catalog, sgmlwhich, SGML entities files and XML entities files.

sect3.title: install-catalog
sect3.para: install-catalog creates a centralized catalog that maintains references to catalogs scattered throughout the /usr/share/sgml directory tree.

sect3.title: sgmlwhich
sect3.para: sgmlwhich will print to standard output the name of the main configuration file.

sect3.title: SGML entities files
sect3.para: SGML entities files contain the basic character entities defined with SDATA entries.

sect3.title: XML entities files
sect3.para: XML entities files contain the basic character entities defined by a hexadecimal representation of the Unicode character number.
